New Records: Willy Adames tied the MLB record for most three-run home runs in a single season with his 13th three-run shot, matching Ken Griffey Jr.'s record from 1996.
Key Match Events: Willy Adames hit a 371-foot, three-run home run in the bottom of the first inning, giving the Milwaukee Brewers an early lead over the St. Louis Cardinals.
The Milwaukee Brewers defeated the St. Louis Cardinals 9-3 on Monday.
